template.subject: Notice of Removal: Assessment / Evaluation Task
template.body:
Dear %TARGET_FIRSTNAME% %TARGET_LASTNAME%,
Please note that an assessment or evaluation task (%ASSESSMENT_NAME%) which was assigned to you for completion on %ASSESSMENT_DATE% has just been removed. Any information you may have filled out for this task has been retained.
If you have any questions or concerns please let us know, or for technical assistance please contact the Education Technology Unit at (613) 555-0123 or via e-mail at healthsci.support@myuniversity.edu.
Sincerely, %CREATOR_FIRSTNAME% %CREATOR_LASTNAME% %CREATOR_EMAIL%
